<p><i><b>Acer macrophyllum</b></i>, the <b>bigleaf maple</b> or <b>Oregon maple</b>, is a large deciduous tree in the genus <i>Acer</i>. It is native to western North America. In addition to uses by animals, it is of some culinary and woodworking interest.
